message.content: This question requires some basic knowledge about the adaptations of cacti. Cactus stems are specialized to store and conserve water, so the correct answer is (B) H2O. Option (A) is incorrect because cactus stems do not store mp3s or any electronic devices. Option (C) is incorrect because cactus stems do not store sand. Option (D) is incorrect because cactus stems do not store seeds.
